mapper.sql: id, root_cid as rootCid, user_id as userId, content, publish_time as publishTime, target_cid as targetCid, target_uid as targetUid, is_reply as isReply, is_replied as isReplied, is_showed as isShowed, sid, treecode, create_time as createTime, update_time as updateTime
mapper.insert: insert into msgbroad ( root_cid, user_id, content, publish_time, target_cid, target_uid, is_reply, is_replied, is_showed, sid, treecode, create_time, update_time) values ( #{rootCid}, #{userId}, #{content}, #{publishTime}, #{targetCid}, #{targetUid}, #{isReply}, #{isReplied}, #{isShowed}, #{sid}, #{treecode}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE update_time=now()
mapper.select:
select
from msgbroad
and root_cid = #{rootCid}
order by publish_time DESC

select
from msgbroad WHERE is_reply=0 order by publish_time DESC
select count(1) from msgbroad WHERE is_reply=0
